self.title: CDISC SDTM COVID-19 Findings About Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the test names that describe findings about COVID-19 related events or interventions.
name: COVID-19 Findings About Test Name

terms.definition: The total number of episodes that have occurred for the condition.
An indication as to whether something has happened, such as an event or incident.
